summary: A hub for all Requiem patches I create! Right now it's mostly gonna focus on Followers and smaller mods, but in the future I may tackle something larger.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my Requiem patch compilation! I'm brand new to modding so I'm using this as a way to get used to what xEdit and the CK can accomplish, while creating patches for my favorite mod, Requiem. Keep in mind that I don't have experience, so some of these mods might need some finetuning. If you have any suggestions or requests for patches please feel free to share in the comments section! I don't wanna do anything [i]too[/i] crazy or big yet, but if I feel it's in my skill set to patch I'll take a shot at it! 

Note that all of these patches are for [b]Requiem 1.9.4.1.[/b] They might work with any future version, but I can't promise that.
[b][center]﻿[/center]Mods Currently Patched[/b]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59028/]Vimune - Kitten Khajiit Companion and Adorable Daughter[/url]﻿ by StikTrooper
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83063]M'rissi's Tails of Troubles [/url]﻿by KreaQ (NOTE: I haven't actually tested this mod myself in game! It might be hilariously out of balance. Consider this a beta version)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81921/?tab=description]Song of the Green[/url]﻿ by Waribiki (Same deal with M'rissi! I'll likely test this one very, very soon though)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39570/?tab=description]Drinks for the Thirsty[/url]﻿ by Karsciyin
[/list]
And more to come soon!

I [i]strongly[/i] recommend using [url=https://www.google.com/search?q=RDO+skyirm&oq=RDO+skyirm&aqs=chrome..69i57j0l5.1103j0j1&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url]﻿, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83554]Immersive Children, [/url]﻿and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56670/]Armor and Clothing for Kids[/url] with Vimune. RDO adds follower dialogue for children, and Immersive Children prevents her from clipping into chairs while also making all children mortal, pickpocketable, and more. Armor and Clothing for Kids allows any and all armor to be used by children, including those added by mods. If you want to use all the patches at the same time, my follower mod of choice is [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36132/]Increased Follower Limit[/url]﻿. It just allows you to have more followers, no other fancy stuff, making it really good to use if you wanted to use one of those fancy followers who conflict with EFF and the like.
author: Ellie

files.name: Requiem - Song of the Green Patch
